医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
睡眠不足对肥胖青少年的影响更大吗？与健康体重的同龄人相比，睡眠不足对肥胖青少年认知功能的影响更大。该研究强调了睡眠对认知健康的重要性，尤其是对于超重的青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Does-poor-sleep-hit-obese-teens-harder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Does-poor-sleep-hit-obese-teens-harder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=740258df-2cfb-48e5-9347-1417ea22481a Thu, 23 May 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Does poor sleep hit obese teens harder?
在促进健康方面，步数计数与基于时间的锻炼一样有效吗？通过步数或锻炼时间来监测身体活动，在减少 60 多岁女性的心血管疾病和全因死亡率方面显示出类似的益处。两种方法都支持健康指南和个人偏好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Are-step-counts-as- effective-as-time-based-exercise-in-boosting-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Are-step-counts-as- effective-as-time-based-exercise-in-boosting-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9936ccb4-4b59-4f45-854e-8ff891bd7922 Thu, 23 May 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Are step counts as effective as time-based exercise in boosting health?
研究人员发现预测 1 型糖尿病患者肾衰竭的进展在《科学转化医学》今天发表的一篇论文中，希望之城（美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，也是糖尿病和其他危及生命的疾病的领先研究中心）的研究人员报告说，他们在以下方面发现了进展：预测 1 型糖尿病 (T1D) 患者的肾衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Researchers-discover-advances-in-predicting-kidney-failure-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Researchers-discover-advances-in-predicting-kidney-failure-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03905dc6-ef40-49e7-a087-ad0a865652ad Wed, 22 May 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Researchers discover advances in predicting kidney failure in type 1 diabetes patients
超加工食品摄入量增加与中风和认知能力下降的风险增加有关2024 年 5 月 22 日发表的一项新研究显示，与少吃加工食品的人相比，多吃软饮料、薯片和饼干等超加工食品的人出现记忆和思维问题以及中风的风险更高，美国神经病学学会医学杂志《Neurology》在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be459c7-e3b4-42cd-b06c-881f1ef8c592 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Higher intake of ultra-processed foods linked to increased risk of stroke and cognitive decline
地点、种族和保险状况在早期与晚期癌症诊断中发挥着关键作用约翰霍普金斯大学彭博学院的研究人员对超过 94,000 名癌症患者进行了详细的医疗记录分析，地点、种族和保险状况在患者被诊断为早期或晚期癌症的几率中起着重要作用。公共卫生部和约翰霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Location-race-and-insurance-status-play-key-role-in-early-stage-versus-late-stage-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Location-race-and-insurance-status-play-key-role-in-early-stage-versus-late-stage-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=876d82d0-351b-4669-adeb-4efe5c732092 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Location, race and insurance status play key role in early-stage versus late-stage cancer diagnosis
利用设计思维创建包容自闭症的医疗环境自闭症是美国最常见的神经发育障碍，估计每 36 名儿童中就有一名患有自闭症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Using-design-thinking-to-create-autism-inclusive-healthcare-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Using-design-thinking-to-create-autism-inclusive-healthcare-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93ace142-9d84-4e2d-85be-51d4dbcb92e9 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:33:24 -0400 Using design thinking to create autism-inclusive healthcare environments
第77届世界卫生大会将在“全民健康，人人享有健康”的框架下应对全球卫生挑战在世界继续努力应对百年来最严重疫情的余波之际，世界卫生大会第七十七届会议将在“全民健康，人人享有健康”的旗帜下召开。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/77th-World-Health-Assembly-to-address-global-health-challenges-under-All-for-Health-Health-for-All.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/77th-World-Health-Assembly-to-address-global-health-challenges-under-All-for-Health-Health-for-All.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6855d28-2b69-4bd3-8130-e944f9cbde17 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:27:04 -0400 77th World Health Assembly to address global health challenges under 'All for Health, Health for All'
克罗米芬和地塞米松可提高 PCOS 患者的生育能力克罗米芬和地塞米松联合治疗可提高 PCOS 患者的妊娠率和排卵率，且副作用最小。需要进一步研究来优化剂量和持续时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Clomiphene-and-dexamethasone-boost-fertility-in-PCOS-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Clomiphene-and-dexamethasone-boost-fertility-in-PCOS-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=532e96e0-ff03-4c7c-badd-0db3e4e2ca10 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Clomiphene and dexamethasone boost fertility in PCOS patients
产前补充 DHA 会增加婴儿脂肪量吗？产前补充 DHA 可增加 24 个月时婴儿的总脂肪量和中心脂肪量，与妊娠体重增加和后代性别无关。需要进一步研究以确定长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Does-prenatal-DHA-supplementation-increase-infant-fat-mass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Does-prenatal-DHA-supplementation-increase-infant-fat-mass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56957251-072e-42f1-b078-4cfe83a5cdb6 Wed, 22 May 2024 22:54:00 -0400 Does prenatal DHA supplementation increase infant fat mass?
人工智能能否比人类更好地检测人工智能生成的文本？中国的一项研究表明，Originality.ai 可以准确检测 100% 的 AI 生成的康复文章，而教授审稿人可以识别 96% 的 AI 改写文章，优于学生审稿人（识别率 76%）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Can-AI-detect-AI- generated-text-better-than- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Can-AI-detect-AI- generated-text-better-than- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2514f2a-6d7b-4e9a-9fc3-7aea6c5bcc48 Wed, 22 May 2024 22:32:00 -0400 Can AI detect AI-generated text better than humans?
